categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures episodes

nodes.text: "The Force Calls to Rey" is the thirty-ninth episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel on March 13, 2020.

On the planet Jakku, Rey walks to her speeder outside of a wrecked Imperial Star Destroyer. The narrator explains that in a "galaxy of adventures", Rey is destined for greatness. As Rey watches a starship ascending, Maz Kanata tells her to close her eyes and feel the Force.

As Rey rides her speeder through the Starship Graveyard, the video shifts to Maz Kanata showing Rey Luke Skywalker's lightsaber at her castle on Takodana. As Maz tells Rey that the lightsaber belonged to Luke and his father, the video shifts to Rey returning the lightsaber to Luke Skywalker on Ahch-To.
As Luke turns his head, Maz tells Rey that it now calls to her. She tells Rey to take it. This is followed by several shots of Rey igniting and flashing the lightsaber.
